name: voiceops-impact-assessment
description: VoiceOps AI Impact Assessment Cloud Functions

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy impactAssessment --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:financial && npm run deploy:delays && npm run deploy:cascade && npm run deploy:kpi && npm run deploy:comprehensive
scripts.deploy:financial: gcloud functions deploy calculateFinancialImpact --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1 --entry-point=calculateFinancialImpact
scripts.deploy:delays: gcloud functions deploy trackDeliveryDelays --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1 --entry-point=trackDeliveryDelays
scripts.deploy:cascade: gcloud functions deploy analyzeCascadeEffects --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1 --entry-point=analyzeCascadeEffects
scripts.deploy:kpi: gcloud functions deploy generateKPIMetrics --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1 --entry-point=generateKPIMetrics
scripts.deploy:comprehensive: gcloud functions deploy comprehensiveImpactAnalysis --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1 --entry-point=comprehensiveImpactAnalysis
